name: Visitors Of The Night
description:
This is a demo of a point and click survival game that is based on and inspired by a fanfiction story by M.Y. Hauger. The demo consists of the beginning of the game. It is still in the early stages of development, and I plan to continue working on it. I plan to post updates as development progresses.

The story behind this game is inspired by other stories by M.Y. Hauger. It is also inspired by Five Nights At Freddy's by Scott Cawthon. This is a fangame and it's non-canon to the stories and games that it is based on.
